Author: sipapito
Text: I was just telling my therapist about a similar situation I had. My bf is always trying to get me to eat more (he's so kind and loving and despite my frustrations, it's not at him, ya know) and I always say "oh but ate XYZ I'm good!" And he's always telling me it's not enough. My therapist said anything in our life can become "normal" to us after a while so when you're used to eating next to nothing, a bit more than that seems like "more than enough" even when it's really not!   So I definitely feel this

Author: snoozepup
Text: it can really mess with ur mind.... i feel this though. i eat one small meal a day if i’m not fasting (or out with friends/holidays) and i always feel guilty for eating so much. but i guess it’s not? most people have three square meals a day with snacks and desserts which is crazy to me. my brothers eat enough in a week to tie me over for a few months. it’s crazy to me tbh. stay safe  ❤️❤️
